Key Match Events: India won by 7 wickets (with 117 balls remaining)
Rohit Sharma scored 86 runs off 63 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Babar Azam: 'I've not been able to play the way I wanted to this World Cup'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jasprit Bumrah was named Player of the Match
India moved to the top of the points table
Others: The match was played at Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad
The match was a day-night 50-over match
Marais Erasmus, Richard Illingworth, Richard Kettleborough, Chris Gaffaney, and Andy Pycroft were the umpires
